question: In which part of the Iberian Peninsula is Teruel, Spain situated?
asked_question_translated: Na katerem delu Iberskega polotoka leži mesto Teruel v Španiji?
answer: Mesto Teruel leži v vzhodnem delu Iberskega polotoka v avtonomni skupnosti Aragón v Španiji.
answer_translated_eng: Teruel is a town in the eastern Iberian Peninsula, in the autonomous community of Aragón, Spain.
